column3: 2015 at 2:00 p.m. at the Qualls Funeral Home Chapel in Cave City with Bro. Phillip Lewallen officiating. Burial will follow in the Barnes Cemetery located at Evening Shade with arrangements by Qualls Funeral Home of Cave City.  Visitation will be Tuesday
column5: 2015 from 6:00 until 8:00 p.m. at the funeral home.
